original_title: Петербург — Мотыгино: как молодой режиссёр провинцию модной делал
overview: Motygino is the smallest and most inaccessible settlement in Russia, which has a local drama theater. Recently, a young St. Petersburg director arrived there and decided to make him a fashionable place: he invited his friends-actors from the capital and began to develop a new theater. Do you think a warm welcome awaited him?
title: St. Petersburg - Motygino: How a Young Director Made the Province Fashionable
